DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine frequencies of histo-pathological findings in dead poisoned patients and evaluate their relationships with age, gender, dosage of poisoning, time of admission and time of death.
DOC.brief_title: Frequencies of Histo-pathological Findings in Patients With Paraquat Toxicity
DOC.detailed_description: Acute poisoning of paraquat which is taken either to commit suicide or by mistake has become a social problem in world. The present study was conducted to determine frequencies of histo-pathological findings in dead poisoned patients and evaluate their relationships with age, gender, dosage of poisoning, time of admission and time of death.
DOC.criteria: every patients who dithionate test were positive nothing
